short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a JAM-Task from a SnapShot!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We | Share is an application that you can share information within the SAP JAM portal. If you really need a connectivity between chrome and SAP JAM, please, go for it!

Before start using, you should maintain the backend configuration from the "Option" page.

#version
# 1.3
minor bug fixes

# 1.2
minor bug fixes

# 1.1
Configuration values will be checked after Option has saved.( Option -> Save & Validate )
Before you share an information you can select Group where you fill the form.
Task creation is available. When a creating a group you could select.

# 1.0
We are able to share an information within the group
